I want to thank all the sectors that participated today in the great dialogue for the democratization and inclusion of Telecommunications.
I reaffirm my commitment to continue to strongly promote this process.

The celebration of the second anniversary of the February 17 revolution began today. I congratulate the Libyan people on this blessed anniversary. And pray to God to make our country secure and stable.
I would like to thank all our children who have been standing at checkpoints for long hours so that we can enjoy safety and maintain the security of the country.
This evening I was in the Martyrs' Square and I was delighted with the popular celebrations in which all the Libyans participated, both young and old, and they were very happy to be free.
